gw.api.graph

Class GraphBuilder<T extends Object>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.graph.GraphBuilder<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphVisitor<T>

    public class GraphBuilder<T extends Object>
extends Object
implements GraphVisitor<T>
    Generic graph builder to build a graph from traversed nodes and edges. All edges will have attributes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Graph<Object> Graph
      Returns the built graph. Must be called after traversal.

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

      Creates a graph builder with default edge creation.

    • Method Detail

      • edgeTraversed

        void edgeTraversed(Object source,
                 Object target,
                 Object attribute)
        Adds the traversed edge to the graph.
        Parameters:
        source - The node that was traversed from
        target - The node being traversed to
        attribute - If the edge is weighted, this is the attribute value (may be null)

      • visit

        void visit(Object node)
        Adds the node to the graph.
        Parameters:
        node - The node being traversed
